name: Best Ever Chocolate Layer Fudge Cake

ingredients.name: Jell-O chocolate flavor instant pudding and pie filling

steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease 2 9 inch baking pans. Chop 2 of the chocolate squares, set aside.
Beat cake mix, dry pudding mix, eggs, sour cream, oil and water in a large bowl with electric mixer on low speed just until moistened.
Beat on medium speed 2 min. Stir in chopped chocolate. Spoon in prepared pans. Bake 30-35 min or until wooden toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool in pans on wire racks 10 min. Loosen cakes from the sides of the pans. Invert onto racks; gently remove from pans, cool cakes completely.
Place frozen whipped topping and remaining 6 chocolate squares in microwavable bowl. Microwave on high 1 1/2 min. or until chocolate is completely melted and mixture is smooth, stirring after 1 min.

Let stand for 15 minutes to thicken. Place 1 cake layer on serving plate; top with 1/4 of the chocolate mixture and the second cake layer. Spread top and side with remaining chocolate mixture. Garnish with almonds. Store in refrigerator.
The fudge-like texture of this cake improves if stored overnight in the refrigerator.
